name: Corn Horror Harvest
description:
Game done in 72h for Ludum Dare 52 with the theme Harvest

Take control of YELLOW, a hardened farmer fighting eldritch vegetables under the orders of a mysterious preacher! Arm yourself with your trusty scythe, and get ready for THE REAPING!

Visual asset : Stevo and Flaps

Sounds : Immoskyl

Game dev : Lucas Rioust & Matthis Pillonel

Game Design : Valentin Guyonneau, Lucas Rioust & Matthis Pillonel
